General.Name: Guangdong Jia Yuan Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Jiayuan Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of electrolytic copper foils. The company offers lithium battery and standard copper foils. It also engages in the export of products and technologies; raw and auxiliary materials, instruments and meters, mechanical equipment, and spare parts and technology business; research and development, and production and sale of new materials and energy products, as well as copper foil industrial equipment and lithium-ion battery materials; and investment, operation, and management of industrial projects. Its products are primarily used in lithium-ion batteries, copper clad laminates, and printed circuit boards, as well as new energy vehicle power battery, energy storage battery, and 3C digital electronic products and other fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Meizhou, China.
